Description: SnapSnack just attacks without truly thinking. Sometimes that's the best strategy.
Anyone looks taller wearing this. It's kind of reassuring when you fight boat sized behemoth.
It always annoyed Maera that this belt looked better on Bal than her.
Never wear this inside or you will scratch the floor. - 1st rule of the FellGiant Family
Perfect if you want to headbutt a rock. Even if it still would be a bad idea.
Wearing this, no creature will be able to hurt you. You will sink, but remain unharmed for sure.
Satisfied or not refunded - Lokasse TwistIron, awesome craftsman
The power of the ReefCrusher lies in its resistance: you don't have to hit the hardest if you resist the longest.
